subtitle: you call your child in and say I heard
something happen today you say to your
child what do you think about that and
the child says I'm sorry I didn't feel I
didn't think it was right it was the
other person's fault he started up with
me whatever the reason but you want to
listen to each other conversation what
you want to say is this was really not
good if I did it
I would not want to do it again what do
you think the child hopefully will say
yes I agree so what do we do about it
now you make your child a partner but
you're explaining your process and
you're not reacting emotionally and
reflexively you're thinking about it and
the child sees that and say
so here's what I think I think because

whatever it may be
because it's important that you remember
